articles.title: Reliance Brands to be India franchisee of Tod's Spa - Economic Times
articles.description: With this long-term franchise agreement, RBL has become the official retailer of the brand across all categories including footwear, handbags and accessories in the Indian market,  said a Reliance Brands statement.
articles.content:
Reliance Brands (RBL) said on Monday that it has signed up as the India franchisee of Tod's Spa to sell footwear, bags and accessories of the Italian lifestyle brand.
